nodes.text: Savatte was a Bardottan male and a guard for Queen Julia of the planet Bardotta. After Julia was kidnapped by members of the Frangawl Cult, led by the turncoat High Seneschal Peteen, Savatte, Jedi Master Mace Windu, and Junior Representative Jar Jar Binks, attempted a rescue operation. Binks was kidnapped, however, and Savatte left to find help. Windu managed to rescue Binks and several other Bardottan leaders, but Peteen escaped Bardotta with Julia in hand.
